Pre-Requisites SoftwareÂ¶

Before you can install Click2Cloud OpenShift 3 Enterprise Tool for Visual Studio, you must download and install the following pre-requisites software:

  1. Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 Update 1

    Install Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 Update 1, the following SKUs are supported:

    1. Enterprise 2015
    2. Professional 2015
    3. Community 2015

  2. Microsoft ASP.NET and Web Tools 2015 (RC)

    Install Microsoft ASP.NET and Web Tools 2015 (RC).

    Note: Please install the corresponding language pack to make sure Web Tools works properly.

  3. Git for Windows

    To download and install Git for Windows, follow instructions specified in Installing Git for Windows or watch video Git on Windows

  4. OpenShift Command Line Interface (CLI) ? Latest Version

    To download and install OpenShift 3 CLI, follow instructions specified in Installing OpenShift 3 CLI.

  5. Docker Command Line Interface (CLI) ? Latest Version (Min V1.10.0)

    To download and install Docker CLI, follow instructions specified in Installing Docker CLI.

Note

You must have sufficient privileges to install software on your computer. Depending on specific user permissions, disabling the User Account Control (UAC) on Windows 7, 8 or 10 operating system may be necessary.
